welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Cyr-l'Ecole, a charming city known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
